thread.title: BRIEF-Barrick Announces Investment In Royal Road Minerals Limited

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Barrick Announces Investment In Royal Road Minerals Limited

organizations.name: brief-barrick announces investment in royal road minerals limited

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Barrick Gold Corp:
* BARRICK ANNOUNCES INVESTMENT IN ROYAL ROAD MINERALS LIMITED
* BARRICK GOLD CORP - ENTERED INTO SUBSCRIPTION AGREEMENT TO BUY 9.9 MILLION SHARES OF ROYAL ROAD MINERALS IN NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT AT $0.16/ SHARE
* BARRICK GOLD - AFTER DEAL, CO WILL OWN ABOUT 21 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES, REPRESENTING ABOUT 12.5% OF ROYAL ROADâ€˜S SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
